hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'm at Liverpool University ageless male in stores In testing, it became clear that the most ergonomic setup places the Controller in front of the keyboard, center to the screen. Then, when it's not in use, place it between the keyboard and monitor (or off to the side of a laptop). It's unlikely you'll actively use the Leap Motion concurrently with your keyboard and mouse, so keep it front and center when you're using an app.
